name: data
Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleString('es-ES'));
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

<style>
   tspan{
   font-size: 18px;
   margin-top: 10px !important;
   }
    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle{
    color: #4709eb !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-gauge-titlel {
        //font-size: 18px !important;
        font-weight: 500px !important;
    }
.text{
font-size: 18px !important;

   }
   .speed{
font-size: 20px !important;
font-weight: 500px !important;
   }
.nr-dashboard-cardpanel{
    max-height: 32px;
    min-height: 32px;
    margin-left: 200 !important;
    margin-top: 10px !important;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    font-weight: 500 !important;
    font-size: 15px !important;
    
}

   
</style>
